Question: A few months later, on October 5, 1974, this person hit his 733rd and final home run as a Brave.
Hints: This person led the league in runs (115), hits (208), doubles (36), RBI (125), total bases (338), and batting average (.362).
This was this person Day in Wisconsin and the Braves played the Milwaukee Brewers in an exhibition game.
In 1999, The Sporting News ranked this person fifth on their "100 Greatest Baseball Players" list.
